markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSeekerSlayerSurvivor/) in {{lax1}}. ## Synopsis The Seeking Face wants you to travel the Deadfire in search of the Fortuneteller's Ear, which may be a literal ear on a literal fortuneteller. ## Walkthrough * You can find the [Fortuneteller's Ear](/fortunetellersEar/) at [Ifren](/ifren/) in [The Dark Cupboard](/theDarkCupboard/) in [Neketaka](/neketaka/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX01_00_Arena_Island/LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_seeker_fortunetellers_ear.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Seeking Face's Hunt for the Fortuneteller's Ear''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Seeking Face wants me to travel the Deadfire in search of the Fortuneteller's Ear, which may be a literal ear on a literal fortuneteller. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the Fortuneteller's Ear.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Engari discovered that the bearer of the Fortuneteller's Ear could be located among the merchants of Neketaka. The shops of Periki's Overlook might be a good start. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Fortuneteller's Ear to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Now that I possess the Fortuneteller's Ear, I must add it to the Pool of Memories to access the spiritual history locked within. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I located the ear and delivered it to the Pool of Memories, opening the way for another challenge from the Faces of the Hunt. |}

The shops of Periki's Overlook might be a good start. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Fortuneteller's Ear to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Now that I possess the Fortuneteller's Ear, I must add it to the Pool of Memories to access the spiritual history locked within. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I located the ear and delivered it to the Pool of Memories, opening the way for another challenge from the Faces of the Hunt. |}
title: The Seeking Face's Hunt for the Fortuneteller's Ear
